subject: Re: [junit] How to read a dynamic value
msgSnippet: ... XMLUnit and XPath will help you here. 1. xmlunit.sourceforge.net 2. Google search for XPath tutorial 3. _JUnit Recipes_, chapter 9 Take care. -- J. B.
messageBody:
nimamallur wrote:
> I want to know how do i read a dynamic value which is enclosed within
> the <tr><span id ="a">......................</span></tr>
> How can i read the value which is in the place of dots.

XMLUnit and XPath will help you here.

1. xmlunit.sourceforge.net
2. Google search for XPath tutorial
3. _JUnit Recipes_, chapter 9

Take care.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
